title: Emerald Kundan Chandbali Jhumka - A Timeless Treasure
materials: and brilliant cut diamonds accents. Sourced from the finest mines
each gemstone has been meticulously selected for its exceptional quality and vibrancy.
features: These elegant Kundan Chandbali Jhumkas showcase the exquisite craftsmanship of Hyderabad's artisans. The centerpiece is a vibrant Emerald Cabochon, surrounded by intricate Polki diamond setting and a halo of brilliant cut diamonds, all meticulously set in 22K gold. The earrings are designed in a chandbali shape with dangling Polki Diamond drops, adding a traditional touch. The open setting allows light to illuminate the gems, enhancing their brilliance. The design blends traditional Mughal and Telugu influences.
occasions: traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham
and even adding a touch of elegance to modern cocktail parties or formal events.
description: This piece is a true heirloom. The use of high-quality 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability. The vibrant Emerald Cabochon and Polki diamond work represent prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift for a loved one or a cherished addition to your own collection. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees a unique and exquisite piece of jewelry that will be admired for generations.
